category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
LORD OF ETERNITY,
The One that angels bow down to,
help me to serve You with deep respect and awe.
You are Spirit and You want truth on the inside;
help me to worship You genuinely—in spirit and in truth.
You are righteous;
don't let me hold onto sin in my heart,
give in to worldly attitudes,
or try to find my satisfaction in things that won't last.

I'm heading toward a moment
when earthly goals and possessions will seem meaningless—
when it won't matter if I was rich or poor,
successful or disappointed, popular or hated.
But what will matter for all of eternity is that I was
truly sorry for my sin,
that I was desperate for righteousness,
that I genuinely loved the Lord Jesus,
and that I found my greatest pride in His cross.

May these be the things that I care about the most.
Create in me the kind of character and mindset
that makes serving You feel like perfect freedom.
Kick out all the sinful fear and shame from my mind,
so that I can have the courage to
tell others about the Savior and face the criticism that comes with following Him,
to be passionate about knowing Him,
to be filled with His wisdom,
to walk carefully,
to ask His advice in everything,
to go to the Bible for His instructions,
and to keep my mind fixed on His peace,
knowing that nothing can happen to me
without His permission, His plan, and His control.
